```{r}
## Load packages
library(plot3D)
```

# Square Max Matrix

```{r}
max_matrix = function(n) {
  n <- 10
  max_m <- c()
  for(i in c(1:n)) {
    for (j in c(1:n)) {
      max_m <- append(max_m, max(i, j))
    }
  }
  dim(max_m) <- c(n, n)
  max_m
}

max_matrix(10)
```

# 3D plot of max matrix 

```{r eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=TRUE}
hist3D(x = 1:n,
      y = 1:n,
      z = max_matrix(n),
      phi = 45,
      theta = -45,
      border = "black",
      d = 1,
      # distance of the eyepoint from the centre of the plotting box
      r = 1, 
      bg = "b",
      box = FALSE,
      # change background color
      par(bg = "black"), 
      colkey = FALSE,
      image = TRUE,
      contour = FALSE
      )
```
